title: Are WNBA players underpaid?
content: The average WNBA player got paid less than $80,000 in 2019–20, while the average NBA player earned $7.4 million in the same period.  That said, the NBA has far higher viewership ratings bringing in much more revenue for the league than the WNBA.

title: Ice Cube has launched a groundbreaking move, providing fans a chance to purchase an ownership stake in his BIG3 3-on-3 basketball league through blockchain technology.
content: It's 21st century team ownership. The Green Bay Packers, of course, are the most famous professional team to be publicly owned, but the BIG3’s approach is distinctive because it’s using a digital, non-fungible token (NFT) model instead of a publicly shared one.

title: Is the concussion protocol being followed in the NFL?
content: No look at Tua Tagovailoa, Dolphins needs to be sued!

title: What are the highest paid team sports for women?
content: Soccer and WNBA players have highest earnings. Female athletes tend to get paid more from individual sports such as tennis and golf.
